summary: Adds the collar of Hidan (wears it around the neck).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]WARNING:[/b][/color] This mod is no longer being developed. This mod, and subsequent changes, were incorporated into the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=786476615]Naruto Overhaul (Steam Workshop)[/url].

Hidan's Collar
==================================================================

Author: esuriddick
Permissions: all the permissions to use the files or models must be directed to 1a1a and robert101410. All I did was to use what they already had done (with their permission) and edit it.

==============================
Description
==============================
Adds Hidan's Collar. There are two ways to obtain the headband:
1 - Craft it (it will be under the iron branch).
2 - Write in console "player.additem 3d000d62 1", without the ".

As a final remark, this collar is also possible to temper with.

I'm not planning to add or change anything, since I think the mod is pretty finished.

==============================
Installation
==============================
Just extract the folders and .esp to Skyrim's Data folder.

==============================
Warnings
==============================
It was tested by SwaGard211, and this mod doesn't work properly with CBBE on female characters. It does, however, with UNP/B/C/K. Thank you for the test :)

==============================
Recommended Mods To Create Hidan
==============================
Hidan's Scythe: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Akatsuki Robe: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24565
Eyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15699


Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112276937

Enjoy.
author: esuriddick
